page.title: 08Leah's Hobbies and Interests
page.content: On weekdays after school I have ballet lessons on Tuesdays, swimming and horse riding on Wednesdays and I go to Brownies on Thursdays. The game that we play most at Brownies is Captain's Coming. It is my favourite game. Brown Owl tells us what we have to do like "scrub the deck". When she says "scrub the deck" we have to kneel down on the floor and scrub the floor. The last Brownie to do the action is out of the game. Saturdays and Sundays are different. On Saturdays I play the violin at Junior Strings in Bedford and on Sundays I have a free day.
